description:
Soma arrives at Polar Star Dormitory with high expectations, only to find it a creepy, run-down place. He is then informed by the dorm warden, Daimido Fumio, that he can only live at the dorm after he impresses her with his cooking. Soma rises up to the challenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La virgen de la Estrella Polar
The Madonna of the Polar Star
